fieldset.title: 示例1
fieldset.text: 本示例主要演示使用crossReport标签配置维度钻取功能

crossReport.label: x2
crossReport.ds: select t.month_id, t.kpi_code, k.kpi_desc, p.pro_no, p.pro_name, c.city_no, c.city_desc, '0.00' kpiFmt, sum(t.kpi_value) kpi_value from dm_kpi_w_card_pandect_m t, dmcode_kpi_lib k, dmcode_province p, dmcode_city c where t.kpi_code = k.kpi_code and p.pro_no = t.prov_id and c.city_no = t.area_no and t.kpi_code in ('A0001', 'A0054', 'A0002', 'A0003', 'A0004') and month_id in ('201002','201003', '201004', '201005', '201006') group by t.month_id, t.kpi_code, k.kpi_desc, p.pro_no, p.pro_name, c.city_no, c.city_desc order by month_id, pro_no, city_no
